basics.name: Aid Arslanagić
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Application Developer and Systems Engineer in a wide variety of business applications. Particularly interested in IT systems design and applications development. In excess of 15 years of experience in a software development environment. Ability to come up fast on any learning curve and develop a deep and thorough understanding of the problem at hand. In-depth knowledge of all phases of analysis, design, data modeling, and development. Excellent programming knowledge and architectural skills, using high-level structured and object languages and technologies. Superior problem-solving skills, initiative and work ethic. Always interested in challenging projects.

work.name: ClearView
work.summary: Senior backend software engineer working on multiple projects for different clients as well as for internal projects utilizing various tech stacks and programming languages
highlights: Qatalog, US, [https://qatalog.com]: The go-to place for team collaboration, building the infrastructure for modern work
Flight-1, US, [https://flight-1.com]: End-to-end curriculum combining basic canopy skills and advanced canopy flight
Merit, US, [https://merits.com]: Verified identity ecosystem which brings visibility and liquidity to all digital credentials
Crowdfox, Germany, [https://www.crowdfox.com]: Innovative purchasing & comparison portals for corporations

work.name: InfoBIP
work.description: A global leader in omnichannel communication
work.summary: Java software engineer working in Automation team
highlights: As part of ateam worked on development of in-house software for automating provisioning of virtual machines and software deployment process

work.name: US DoJ ICITAP/Engility
work.description: The International Criminal Investigative Training Assistance Program (ICITAP)
work.summary: Worked on IT aspects on different law-enforcement and judicial strengthening projects
highlights: State Border Guard Service, Bosnia and Herzegovina: Collect intelligence data in electronic form. Organize and build relationships between entities (persons, vehicles, weapons, locations, etc.). Provide basic search and communication capabilities based on access level rights.
Ministry of Interior, Bosnia and Herzegovina: Software for tracking police evidence handling and chain of custody with barcode scanning capabilities.

State Investigation and Protection Agency, Bosnia and Herzegovina: Design and implementation of State Police Network project (SPIN), countrywide secure wireless network connecting over 70 border crossings and other points of interest.

work.name: EuroproNET
work.summary: Worked on IT aspects on different law-enforcement and judicial strengthening projects
highlights: Design and implementation of Cable Provisioning System with billing
DNS system planning, implementation and administration
Designed and implemented network core monitoring system
mplementation of custom Unix based VPN solution

references.name: Scott McKnight, ENGILITY
references.reference: During his eleven (11) years as an Engility contractor to DOJ/ICITAP, Mr. Arslanagić has worked on numerous classifed law enforcement related projects that cost millions of dollars to design and put into operation. Mr. Arslanagić is highly motivated, able to multi task and a very professional employee who would be a highly valued asset to any organization.

references.name: James J. Tillman, ICITAP
references.reference: Throughout his work with ICITAP Mr. Aid Arslanagić has proven to be a valuable member of our agency, skillful, intelligent, communicative and capable of handling tasks posed upon him as well as any organizational issues he was faced with. His persistence and adaptation skills made difference more than once and got distinctive contribution to the projects he was working on.

references.name: Aleksandar Dostić, INFOBIP
references.reference: Mr. Arslanagić proved himself to be a very fast learner, and always ready to mentor and teach other members. When developing a product, he always has clients satisfaction and usability at first place. With excellent teamwork skills, Mr. Arslanagić is a reliable person and an employee that does whatever is necessary to do an extraordinary job.

references.name: Amir Oručević, EUROPRONET
references.reference: I recommend Mr. Arslanagić without hesitation for a senior technical position, including any combination of project management, technical architecture, software design and development, and customer relationship management.

references.name: Goran Milojković, INLIFE
references.reference: Aid displayed the qualities that make an IT Engineer successful. He is dependable, motivated and in tune with the needs of our customers. Based on my experience working with him, I can unreservedly recommend Aid Arslanagić to you.

projects.name: super.ba

API: node.js / fastify / jwt / mongodb / websockets
